H0.text: which central american nations border the pacific ocean and the caribbean sea. Costa Rica

H1.text: which central american nations border the pacific ocean and the caribbean sea. Panama

H2.text: which central american nations border the pacific ocean and the caribbean sea. Honduras

H3.text: which central american nations border the pacific ocean and the caribbean sea. Nicaragua

A4.text: Panama is located in Central America, bordering both the Caribbean Sea and the Pacific Ocean, between Colombia and Costa Rica.

A5.text: It is bordered by Costa Rica to the west, Colombia to the southeast, the Caribbean Sea to the north, and the Pacific Ocean to the south.
